overview:
Mr. Paulson joined Gatekeeper in 2001. In 1990, Mr. Paulson graduated Cum Laude with a Bachelor of Arts, Economics from the University of California, Irvine. After receiving his degree, Mr. Paulson spent three years at The Smyth Companies, a regional commercial real estate development and management firm.

In 1993, Mr. Paulson joined Belgravia Capital Corporation, a commercial mortgage banking company. In his six-year tenure with the company, he held various positions, advancing to the level of Vice President of Capital Markets. From 1999 through 2002, Mr. Paulson was active as a partner with Belgravia Capital Partners, LLC.
